translations: vt.记忆；存储（memorize 的英式拼写）

sentences.sentence: Looking back at Lijiang this moment brings back fond memorises.
sentences.translation: 回顾在丽江度过的时光，给我留下了如此美好的回忆。

sentences.sentence: She has bushy brown hair, large front teeth and memorises the course books by heart.
sentences.translation: 她有一头浓密蓬乱的褐发，长着大板牙，对课本上的内容烂熟于心。
